Package com.bizosys.hsearch.util

Class Summary
CoordinateConversion It supports Nothing-Eastering and Latitude-Longitude coordinate systems.
FileReaderUtil Various file related utility operations.
GeoId Geological location.
Hash Does MD5 hashing
HostUtils Provides running host identity.
HttpDateFormat Class to handle HTTP dates.
IpUtil Represent the IP address to a unique integer.
LuceneConstants This provides the current library versions used in the lucene During migration, the old version will be loaded based on the configuration file.
ObjectFactory  
Record A Record
RecordScalar A Record
UrlShortner Url shortner reads urlmappings file and applies shortening
Example (The URL and tab separated short code)
http://www.bizosys.com/employee.xml/id= 01
http://www.bizosys.com/employee? 02
http://www.bizosys.com/company.xml/id= 03
UtilLog
